moves.1. b4: orangutan opening : i'm trying to tame the beast !
moves.2. Bb2: main line : proposing exchange b4 agains e5 but destroying black center and then treaths if black take b4.
moves.2... Qf6: unknown variation ! I thing this is not so good exposing the queen to a dicovered attack
moves.3... c5 4. Nc3: i have a secret weapon prepared... : Kd5...Kc7+ wins rook. Of course this is not so secret !
moves.4... cxb4 5. Nd5: but it can serve ! At less to get back my b4 pawn
moves.7... Bg7 8. e3: c4 will be a nice position for my LSB...
moves.8... Bf6 9. Bc4 Qb6: blunder : I come again with my knight in d5
moves.10. Nd5 Qc6: i willl win the e5 pawn after exchange black bishop with d5 knight
moves.11. Nxf6+ Nxf6: so ther is the nice fork coming, i'm sure the good players have seen it from before...isnt it ?!
moves.13. Nxe5+: here we are ! So isnt the orangutan a funy one ?
